properties.Name: Ebury Bridge estate
properties.Description: Estate comprises 13 blocks containing 336 homes.  (Bucknill, Doneraile, Rye, Victoria, Westbourne, Bridge, Dalton, Edgson, Hillersden, Pimlico, Mercer, Wainwright, Wellesley Houses.)
properties.Status: Demolition on phase 1 is scheduled for Feb 2020. Decant is underway with 117 secure tenants decanted to date. Ballot not required because no intention to apply for grant.

properties.Name: Church Street Area
properties.Description: Circa 720 homes across 5 phases•Lilestone Street•Church Street Sites (A, B and C)•Lisson Grove•Gateforth and Cockpit Theatre•Little Church Street.
properties.Status: First Phase (Church St Sites A, B and C coming forward now – There appears to be no intention of applying for grant funding)

properties.Name: Winstanley & York Rd estates
properties.Description: 709 homes across 13 blocks earmarked for demolition (Pennethorne Hse, Lavender Rd, Chesterton Hse, Holcroft Hse, Scholey Hse, Arthur Newton Hse, Ganley Ct, Shepard Hse, Gagarin Hse, Farrant Hse, Jackson Hse, Kiloh Ct, Baker Hse.)

properties.Name: Alton Area regeneration
properties.Description: 288 homes earmarked for demolition (Danebury Ave, Allbrook Hse, Harbridge Ave, Kingsclere Close, Portswood Place).
properties.Status: Planning submitted - appears grant funding not sought.

properties.Name: Avenue Road estate
properties.Description: 258 homes in 4 blocks earmarked for demolition (Blackthorn Ct, Gean Ct, Mulberry Ct, Rosewood Ct)
properties.Status: Early options appraisal studies being conducted - confirms residents will be balloted if demolition is pursued.

properties.Name: Fred Wigg & John Walsh Towers
properties.Status: All redevelopment options postponed until after Grenfell Inquiry concluded.

properties.Name: Chaucer estate
properties.Description: Earmarked for renewal in Sutton's Local Plan 2018
properties.Status: Received planning designation for redevelopment - options appriasal being carried out.

properties.Name: Collingwood estate
properties.Description: Earmarked for redevelopment in Sutton's Local Plan 2018 (page 27)
properties.Status: Received planning designation for redevelopment - options appriasal being carried out.
